inventory=[{"type": "poppy", "quantity": 57, "index": 15}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a redstone_block, I need to move 9 redstone into the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 redstone from slot 37 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1
